Talk_1_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Yeah. Just before <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>
began pouring out of the ground.

It clung to the weapons, pulsing, as
if alive...

We watched as <clr:0000>the weapons rotted to
pieces <clr:ffff>right before our eyes,<sp:5:0:0> rendering
them useless.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I couldn't make sense of it at first,
but to think it was the doing of this
Demon King guy...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>At a time when Hyrule Castle can float,
I've given up trying to make sense of
much of anything.
Talk_0_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oops... Morning already?


I've been nose down, so I completely lost
track of time.
Talk_1_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This's pretty involved, so I'm going to
keep sitting here while I wrench on this.
Talk_1_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, yeah.


In case nobody has mentioned yet, you're
welcome to the weapons over there.

Though they probably won't be much
use to you, since they're—you guessed
it—<clr:0000>decayed<clr:ffff>.
Talk_6_1:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, hey. I heard something... Is it true the
Demon King is in the castle?

Which would mean...the gloom that <clr:0000>made
the weapons decay<clr:ffff> is his fault?

Which also means, once he's gone, I'll be
finished with this work.
Talk_0_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oops... Afternoon already?


I've been nose down, so I completely lost
track of time.
Talk_1_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>You might've heard, but when the
Upheaval happened, all of the
<clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>decayed<clr:ffff>.
I've poured so much energy into trying to
fix them, but it's been no use.
Talk_1_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>When the Upheaval happened, all of
the <clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>decayed<clr:ffff>.

I've been <clr:0000>attaching various things <clr:ffff>to the
tips of weapons.
Talk_6_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If the <clr:0000>decaying weapons<clr:ffff> is this
Demon King guy's doing...

Then that means once he's gone, I'll be
freed up from this work.
Talk_0_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oops... Evening already?


I've been nose down, so I completely lost
track of time.
Talk_0_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oops... Nighttime already?


I've been nose down, so I completely lost
track of time.
Talk_0_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oops... Night already?


I've been nose down, so I completely lost
track of time.
Talk_0_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Oh, hey. Is that you, Link?


I've been nose down, so I don't know
what's happening around me half
the time.
Talk_2_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Good work, Link. I heard you helped
a village out of a crisis.
Talk_2_7:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I'm trying to repair the <clr:0000>decayed weapons<clr:ffff>,
in the hopes I can help out too.

But try as I might, I come up short.


It seems all you can do is use the
weapons by <clr:0000>attaching things to the
ends <clr:ffff>of them.
Talk_1_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Yeah. Just before <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>
began pouring out of the ground.

It clung to the weapons, pulsing, as
if alive...

We watched as <clr:0000>the weapons rotted to
pieces <clr:ffff>right before our eyes.

<snd:Think_01>It was all pretty wild, and I don't
understand how it happened.

At a time when Hyrule Castle can float,
I've given up trying to make sense of
most things.
